longBusinessSummary: Koatsu Gas Kogyo Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the gas, chemical products, and IT solutions business in Japan. It provides dissolved acetylene gas for welding, cutting, heating, removing glass and copper wire from molds, pharmaceutical synthesis, and carbon raw materials applications; laser gas/mixed gas for various applications, such as laser processing, welding, sterilization, biotechnology, and food products; separated gas used analytical instruments for measuring the concentration of various air pollutants, automobile exhaust gas and flue gas, and calibration of gas detectors; LP gas/LNG for cutting/heating and various fuel applications; agricultural carbon dioxide; gas cylinders; and safety systems. The company also offers chemical products, such as adhesives for household and industrial applications; and PEGAR, a synthetic resin emulsion for various applications, such as adhesives, pressure sensitive adhesives, paint binders, and additives for construction materials, as well as nonwoven shock-absorbing materials. In addition, the company provides CYANON and PEGALOCK, an adhesive material. Further, the company offers RF tag related devices and their application systems, which used for railway equipment management and recognition of production lines; LSI cards and reader writers; GNSS receiver modules; and electronic line application products. Koatsu Gas Kogyo Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1943 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
